author: cmpilato
msg: On the 'svn-mergeinfo-enhancements' branch, only allow a single target
(svn_cl__cmd_table): Allow only a single path target for 'svn mergeinfo'.
(show_mergeinfo_for_source): Lose a level of indentation in output.
(svn_cl__mergeinfo): Expect and handle only a single target path now.
(MergeinfoReportParser): Tweak this parser to no longer expect
multiple target paths, and to make source paths the primary report
data keys.  (I could list every single detail of this obvious
(run_and_verify_mergeinfo): No longer deal with target paths, and no
longer expect the MergeinfoReportParser() to deal with them either.

author: lgo
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c: Follow up on r30092 with some typo fixes.

author: lgo
msg: * subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/util.c: Add and improve some function
